item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-29
item.description: Here are the notes from the HEIR meeting on 2023-08-29. There was an issue with the recording, so there is no video recording this week.

item.title: Blog: Hello, World!
item.description:
Hello, world! We’re starting a project to unify homomorphic encryption compiler IRs.

Our initial meeting was 2023-05-30 (read-only copy of the minutes). Stay tuned for future updates while we work out a meeting schedule.
